TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SessionStateModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule, class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateModule
Public NotInheritable Class SessionStateModule Implements ISessionStateModule
type SessionStateModule = class interface ISessionStateModule interface IHttpModule

summary.span: Provides session-state services for an application.

span.span: Provides session-state services for an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ASP。NET 的默认会话状态处理程序。 is ASP.NET's default session-state handler. 它可将会话数据写入和从会话状态存储和引发检索**Session_OnStart**和**Session_OnEnd**事件。It writes session data to and retrieves it from the session-state store and raises the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events. 有关如何使用 ASP.NET 会话状态存储和检索值的用户会话的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 会话状态概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc)。For details about how to use ASP.NET session state to store and retrieve values for a user session, see [ASP.NET Session State Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d60d381-6521-4e1d-9089-da6464f2a9bc). 你可以替换的自定义实现管理会话状态的接口。You can replace the with a custom implementation of the interface that manages session state. 有关自定义会话状态模块的示例，请参阅类概述。For an example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不应从应用程序代码中调用。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 应用程序启动时创建对象。An object is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 对象调用构造函数来创建应用程序的对象。The object calls the constructor to create the object for the application. 应用程序配置中指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

summary.span: Executes final cleanup code before the object is released from memory.

span.span: Executes final cleanup code before the object is released from memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不应从应用程序代码中调用。This method is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 应用程序启动时创建对象。An object is created when an ASP.NET application is started. 对象创建并初始化对象的应用程序和调用方法释放的对象时。The object creates and initializes the object for the application and calls the method when the object is released. 应用程序配置中指定。The is specified in the configuration for an application.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event End As EventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请求末尾引发事件时调用方法或会话已过期。The event is raised at the end of a request when the method has been called or when the session has expired. 会话过期时的分钟数指定没有请求正在进行的会话，将传递属性。A session expires when the number of minutes specified by the property passes without a request being made for the session. **Session_OnEnd**事件用于执行任何清理工作，如释放资源由会话的会话。The **Session_OnEnd** event is used to perform any cleanup work for a session such as disposing of resources used by the session. 你可以指定的处理程序事件通过添加一个名为的公共子例程**Session_OnEnd**到 Global.asax 文件。You can specify a handler for the event by adding a public subroutine named **Session_OnEnd** to the Global.asax file. > [!NOTE] > **Session_OnEnd**事件才会支持时，会话状态属性值是，这是默认设置。The **Session_OnEnd** event is only supported when the session-state property value is , which is the default. 如果会话状态设置为或，则**Session_OnEnd** Global.asax 文件中的事件将被忽略。If the session-state is set to or , then the **Session_OnEnd** event in the Global.asax file is ignored. 如果会话状态属性值是，然后支持**Session_OnEnd**事件由自定义会话状态存储提供程序。If the session state property value is , then support for the **Session_OnEnd** event is determined by the custom session-state store provider. 尽管事件是公用的你可以通过在 Global.asax 文件中添加事件处理程序仅处理。Though the event is public, you can only handle it by adding an event handler in the Global.asax file. 因为实现此限制实例中的性能将重用。This restriction is implemented because instances are reused for performance. 当会话过期时，仅**Session_OnEnd** Global.asax 文件中指定的事件执行时，阻止调用代码与关联的事件处理程序当前正在使用的实例。When a session expires, only the **Session_OnEnd** event specified in the Global.asax file is executed, to prevent code from calling an event handler associated with an instance that is currently in use. 有关 Global.asax 文件的详细信息，请参阅[Global.asax 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582)。For more information about the Global.asax file, see [Global.asax Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有的 Global.asax 文件的内容**Session_OnStart**和**Session_OnEnd**定义事件。The following code example shows the contents of a Global.asax file with the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events defined. ```vb ``` ```csharp ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Start As EventHandler

summary.span: The event that occurs when a session is created.

span.span: The event that occurs when a session is created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新会话启动时，请求的开始处引发的事件。The event is raised at the beginning of a request when a new session is started. 如果发出请求，其中不包含会话标识符、 会话标识符无效，或已过期的会话标识符与关联的会话，启动新会话。A new session is started if a request is made that does not contain a session identifier, the session identifier is invalid, or the session associated with a session identifier has expired. **Session_OnStart**事件用于执行任何初始化工作，如设置会话变量的默认值的会话。The **Session_OnStart** event is used to perform any initialization work for a session such as setting up default values for session variables. 你可以指定的处理程序事件通过添加一个名为的公共子例程**Session_OnStart**到 Global.asax 文件。You can specify a handler for the event by adding a public subroutine named **Session_OnStart** to the Global.asax file. 有关 Global.asax 文件的详细信息，请参阅[Global.asax 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582)。For more information about the Global.asax file, see [Global.asax Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9ade9d4d-4d52-4e88-af52-53a9ffa26582). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示具有的 Global.asax 文件的内容**Session_OnStart**和**Session_OnEnd**定义事件。The following code example shows the contents of a Global.asax file with the **Session_OnStart** and **Session_OnEnd** events defined. ```vb ``` ```csharp ```
